title: Tatakae!! Iczer 1 Tokubetsu-hen
title_japanese: 戦え!!イクサー1 特別編
synopsis: Compilation movie of Tatakae!! Iczer-1. There are also completely new scenes and drawn cuts. All words are re-recorded, and the usage of music has also been changed. Note to DB mods: i know that this has been declined once before, but i think this has been a wrongful decline, as there are other movie versions of OVA with even less new content than this, such as Macross Plus, Gosenzosama Banbanzai and Armitage III. The info above comes from the japanese Wikipedia. Though it might not be a strong argument, I see that kitsu.io also added it as a separate entry and acknowledged it has "few minutes of extra or reworked footage"
